properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_WRITER , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_WRITER , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
